name: aziraphale/quassel-log-search
description: A PHP webapp for search Quassel backlogs

authors.name: m4yer
authors.role: Developer of the original Quassel LogSearch

suggest.ext-pdo_mysql: Required to support MySQL Quassel backends
suggest.ext-pdo_pgsql: Required to support PostgreSQL Quassel backends
suggest.ext-pdo_sqlite: Required to support SQLite Quassel backends
